sentences: Goodbye, Mr. Smith! - Good night, Anna!
Sleep well, Michael! - You, too, Anna!
Where are you? - I'm in Tokyo.
Is Emily from Brazil? - No, she isn’t. She’s English.
What's this? - This is my dog's house.
Who is this tall boy? - He's Steven. He's my friend from America.
Welcome to Spain! - Thank you! We are very happy here.
Can you answer this question? - No, I don’t know the answer.
Do you speak German here? - No, we only speak English.
Do you want to eat pizza? - No, I'm not hungry, thanks.
